buildCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y pkg-config build-essential libxml2-dev libxslt1-dev zlib1g-dev && export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig && export NOKOGIRI_USE_SYSTEM_LIBRARIES=true && bundle config build.nokogiri "--use-system-libraries --with-xml2-include=/usr/include/libxml2 --with-xml2-lib=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu" && bundle install && jekyll build
